name: Red Velvet Smoothie
description: The star of this smoothie is the combo of beets and protein powder. Beets provide a vibrant red colour and subtle, earthy flavour. Beets are also loaded with antioxidants and are believed to support cardiovascular health and a healthy inflammatory response. And the protein powder? That delivers cakey fun flavour plus 20 g of plant-based protein.

ingredients.name: 2% plain Greek yogurt or dairy-free yogurt alternative
Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend or Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend

preparation: In a blender, combine beets, raspberries, banana, yogurt, water, and protein blend until smooth, about 30 sec.
Pour into chilled glasses and enjoy!
tips: Look for cooked, chopped beets in the refrigerated section of the veggie aisle in most grocery stores. Alternatively, try steaming raw at home in the Multipurpose Steamer or simply swap for canned cooked beets.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 slice whole-grain bread and 2 tsp nut butter.
